text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been a few days since I started<n>my life as a trainer at
Tracen<n>Academy.

Error. Specified coordinates do not<n>correspond with target
location.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While walking around the shopping<n>district, I notice an
Umamusume<n>standing in the middle of the path.

GPS is currently unresponsive.<n>Detecting a shift in emotional<n>
state—"despair" has been identified.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Tracen Academy trainer badge<n>confirmed. Hello. My name
is Mihono<n>Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I am currently experiencing "despair"<n>because I am unable
to locate the new<n>training equipment store.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Upon inquiry, a passerby instructed<n>me to walk straight for
approximately<n>one-hundred meters. However, the<n>
provided data appears incorrect.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
In addition, my mobile device is<n>malfunctioning. I am unable
to access<n>the GPS.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sensing her obvious confusion, I pull<n>out my phone and
begin to search on<n>the internet.
choice_data_list: Let me give you a hand.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly find the store—just a mere<n>42 meters away.
Squinting ahead, I<n>can make out the sign from here.
choice_data_list: Just walk a bit more that way and you'll see it.
Just walk a bit more that way and you'll see it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Pardon. Please define "a bit more."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: If possible, please quantify "a bit<n>more" in numerical terms.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ..."Around?"

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for confirming that the<n>store is 42 meters ahead.
It seems<n>that my original informant had<n>miscalculated the
distance.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Regardless, this could have been<n>avoided had I done
sufficient<n>research. I will log this event in my<n>database to
prevent future<n>occurrences.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Once again, thank you for your<n>assistance.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Destination—42 meters ahead.<n>Commencing navigation.
choice_data_list: (She's a strange one, that's for sure...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I keep watch as she heads down the<n>street, then
disappears into the correct<n>shop.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after that odd encounter, I<n>stop by a mock race,
hoping to scout a<n>few students.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, isn't Mihono Bourbon here<n>today? I heard she did well
in her<n>races before admission to Tracen.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that cyborg of a student? I think I<n>saw her around,
though I wouldn't get<n>my hopes up if I were you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The voices of excited trainers drown<n>each other out as
everyone gathers<n>information. An electric buzz fills the<n>air
as the clock counts down.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The sound of the opening gates<n>echoes through the stadium
as<n>participants charge down the track.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text: Do you see the one in front? Look at<n>her go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Leading the pack is Mihono Bourbon,<n>determined to put
distance between<n>her and the rest.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
The rumors were right—her speed is<n>really something else.
This<n>newcomer's gonna change the game<n>for sprinters!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon charges ahead of<n>her opponents with
overwhelming<n>force. Her lone figure quickly<n>approaches
the goal.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without losing her lead even once,<n>she calmly crosses the
finish line in a<n>convincing show of power.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A sense of complete awe washes<n>over me—it's almost
hard to believe<n>the lost Umamusume I met days ago<n>is the
same person!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text: That potential... I gotta scout her<n>before the others do!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text: You're too late. She's already got a<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And sure enough, I find Mihono<n>Bourbon talking to
someone.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Looks like she's with a veteran too.<n>Agh, better luck next
time I guess.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'm surprised you didn't know. That<n>trainer's been gushing
about how<n>he'll make Bourbon the perfect<n>sprinter.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Reluctantly accepting defeat, I decide<n>to quietly support
Mihono Bourbon<n>from the sidelines.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the sun long past set, I start<n>making my way back
home—only to<n>notice someone on the track.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It looks like she's doing some<n>evening training by herself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Hah... 1,800 meters completed. 1,200<n>meters remaining.
Time—2:04. Speed<n>insufficient to meet target!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curious, I listen to Mihono Bourbon<n>calculating her time and
distance—until<n>something hits me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My mind reels at the number. It's<n>practically unheard of for
pre-debut<n>racers to attempt such long distances.<n>The risk
of injury is too great!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ahh... argh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Panicking, I rush to Mihono<n>Bourbon's side to check on her.
